name: C.A.T.S
description:
First game I've ever made!

For the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3

Theme: Less is more

Cats have attacked and wiped out most of humanity, you belong to a small resistance that has been continuously attacked by the feline menace.

You must leave the safety of your bunker to gather vital items that will help humanity defeat the cats:

A Laser Pointer, Spray Bottle and Catnip

But choose your kit wisely, the better gear that you take the worse you leave behind for those defending the bunker. 

Controls:

W A S D - Click to shoot

Programming and Audio by myself with all the art done by my friend Pot8rtot

I apologies for the lack of sounds and music, I did not have enough time to add them :(
